document_name: Design of a first law to change the fuel emission trade law
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DEU/2020/DEU-2020-01-01-Design of a first law to change the fuel emission trade law_ddddc4994ac7e33e0e121cca2038c413.pdf
document_description: The law on national certificate trading for fuel emissions (Brennstoffemissionshandelsgesetz) is part of the 2030 climate package and introduces emissions trading for the heating and transport sectors from 2021 onward. It notably aims at avoiding carbon leakage. Certificate prices were agreed in parliament around October 2020.
